articles.title: India stars make big moves in latest T20I Rankings - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Deepti Sharma’s star is in the ascendency, with a string of fine performances helping her attain career-best in both the MRF Tyres T20I Bowling and All-Rounders Rankings, while a fellow Indian is also making moves in the Batting Rankings.
